review: so far so good I didn't have a smart TV firestick made it smarter
author: Kevin Milanowski

review: I really like this when it works. There are a lot of options and I have really enjoyed the Amazon programming, especially the New Yorker Magazine, Alpha House and Mozart in the Jungle. I get upset though when in the middle of watching something, it stops working and says there is not enough bandwidth.
author: Virginia Hula

review: It is awesome I have ordered 2 more for my other tvs
author: joanne

review: Easy to setup and use! Love it!
author: maggie

review: So far so great!  i've only had it about it week, but it's been great. I'm an Amazon prime member and Netflix subscriber. I used to watch Amazon video mostly on my Kindle fire and Netflix on my computer. Now, I watch both on my regular TV!  The instructions to set it up were easy to follow and, for once, not written by someone who sounds as though English was a second language. You will need your WiFi password and amazon login.  Haven't explored the games or music much yet, just watching the videos so far.
author: C. Hoffman

review: I'm satisfied with this purchase and the stick.
author: Myrna
